        public Version getVersion()

      • setCheckins

        public void setCheckins(int checkins)
        Set the checkin status on the Ushahidi deployment. 0 means checkins has been disabled on the Ushahidi deployment and 1 for enabled.
        Parameters:
        checkins - The checkin status. 0 disabled and 1 enabled

      • setSms

        public void setSms(java.lang.String sms)
        Set the default SMS number as configured on the Ushahidi deployment. This the number users send SMS to and receive SMS from.
        Parameters:
        sms - The phone number. It includes the country code if it's set on the Ushahidi deployment

      • getSms
